info.name: Namuwiki Vertical Writing
info.description:
Transforms Namuwiki into the vertical writing format.

contains a lot of mess ups on formatting (commas and dots, frontpage, etc).

best result without recent changes/namulive card.

scrolling is not supported.
info.additionalInfo:
2017年2月20日 - 初期版
2017年2月23日 - 便宜性 向上, 誤謬 訂正

data.title: I hope it would be helpful for you to read articles
